attributes.action: put a stop to internet sites and providers that allow illegal music and film downloads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To shut down and monitor sites, search engines, applications that exist to provide illegal music and film downloads.

Every year millions of pounds in tax is lost from illegal downloads, as well as artists, producers and companies losing a large percentage of their profits.

Perhaps all this tax could help us out of the current global financial situation. 

As well as tough penalties for companies that are involved in illegal software and downloads.
